channel.title: Kilometer on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Kilometer on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-6 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-6 west. Distance to Bishop and Independence. This is an older style distance marker which lists distances in miles and kilometers. These dual unit signs are scattered around California, although they tend to be older with button copy lettering.
